Description_lang: Summon $s7 roots to draw on their power for $d, slowing you by ${$422440s2/4}% per root. Your next $s7 melee abilities each sever a root, dealing $422440s1 additional Shadowflame damage split between nearby enemies.Damage increased per enemy struck, up to 5.
AuraDescription_lang: Melee abilities sever a root, dealing $422440w1 additional Shadowflame damage split between nearby enemies.Slowed by $w2%.
